attributes.action: End direct overseas aid payments in all cases where Britain is already making a contribution through other established channels.
attributes.additional_details: The purpose of this petition is to prohibit the British government from making additional overseas aid contributions to countries who are already in receipt of overseas aid through other, established organizations and schemes that the British part fund (e.g. EU overseas aid programs; UNHCR; etc.).  The prohibition on direct aid shall also apply to those countries who are actively engaged in anti-British actions or rhetoric (e.g Argentina ref: Falkland islands; Spain ref: Gibraltar; etc.)
